Name: HMS Wheatland
awards: Arctic 1942, North Africa 1942–43, Sicily 1943, Mediterranean 1943, Salerno 1943, Adriatic 1944
Displacement:
1,050 long tons (1,070 t) standard
1,430 long tons (1,450 t) full load
Propulsion:
2 Admiralty 3-drum boilers
2 shaft Parsons geared turbines, 19,000 shp (14,000 kW)
Speed:
27 knots (31 mph; 50 km/h)
25.5 kn (29.3 mph; 47.2 km/h) full
Armament:
6 × QF 4-inch (102 mm) Mark XVI guns on twin mounts Mk. XIX
4 × QF 2-pounder (40 mm) Mk. VIII AA guns on quad mount MK.VII
2 × 20 mm Oerlikon AA guns on single mounts P Mk. III
110 depth charges, 2 throwers, 3 racks
